page.title: 13TRADE IN THE AREA
page.content: There are two main groups of shops in our area.One is at Whitestone, which has a Chemist, Post-Office(linked with a newsagents), a butchers and a General Grocers. Our main survey was in Attleborough. Here there are a great variety of shops. There is a tailors a pet shop, a fish and chip shop, a video shop, 2 shoe shops, a garden centre, D.I.Y. shop, a post office, a bakers, 3 hairdressers, a butchers, 2 clothes shops, a bed shop, a newsagents, a stationers, a restaurant and a Chinese Takeaway. By far the biggest shop is a new Co-op which sells many items.Many people come from outside the area to shop at this superstore.As well as shops there are two banks, a garage and a tyre fitting service.
